choices.text:
### Human:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for this week.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews
### Assistant:

Here's a sample meal plan for you based on your preferences and food restrictions:

Monday:

* Grilled chicken breast with steamed asparagus and brown rice
* Green salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and olive oil and vinegar dressing

Tuesday:

* Baked salmon with roasted sweet potatoes and green beans
* Whole wheat pasta with marinara sauce and steamed zucchini

Wednesday:

* Grilled tofu with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and olive oil and vinegar dressing
* Quinoa salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and olive oil and vinegar dressing

Thursday:

* Grilled chicken breast with steamed asparagus and brown rice
* Green salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and olive oil and vinegar dressing

Friday:

* Baked salmon with roasted sweet potatoes and green beans
* Whole wheat pasta with marinara sauce and steamed zucchini

Saturday:

* Grilled tofu with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and olive oil and vinegar dressing
* Quinoa salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and olive oil and vinegar dressing

Sunday:

* Grilled chicken breast with steamed asparagus and brown rice
* Green salad with mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and olive oil and vinegar dressing

Remember to vary your food choices and include a variety of fruits, vegetables, lean proteins, and whole grains in your meals. You can also try experimenting with different seasonings and marinades to add flavor without dairy or garlic.
